title: Morning Minute: Bitcoin and ETH Trading Is Coming to the NYSE, Nasdaq and More
summary: SEC & CFTC team up for 'Project Crypto' while SOL dominates amidst green market surge.

body.raw:
![Morning Minute: Bitcoin and ETH Trading Is Coming to the NYSE, Nasdaq and More](https://cdn.decrypt.co/wp-content/uploads/2025/07/SEC-Decrypt2-gID_7.jpg)

SEC & CFTC team up for 'Project Crypto' while SOL dominates amidst green market surge.
